instruction: Compose an email inviting clients to an event
output:
Dear Client,

I am excited to invite you to join us in celebrating My Business’s 10th Anniversary! This will be a great chance to reconnect with old friends and make new ones. We will have great food, drinks, music, and tons of fun activities. We would love to have you join us in celebrating this important milestone.

The event will take place on June 25th at 6PM. Please let us know if you can join us so that we can ensure we have enough refreshments.

We look forward to seeing you there!

Regards,
[Your Name]
